Featuring nine individual suites, this entire property is yours to enjoy in complete privacy - after days spent chasing crashing waterfalls, exploring ancient temples or savouring legendary sunsets in the south of Samui, return to a magnificent infinity pool, top-notch fitness centre and a private executive chef specialising in sumptuous Thai and Indian plates. There's no better way to experience Thailand's most beloved island paradise - Upni Duniya's world-class staff are available to help organise your next adventure.

title: Koh Samui 5-Star Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Daily Cocktails
description:
Wake up to the sound of the ocean and embrace absolute tranquillity at The Lamai Samui, a five-star oasis on the white sands of Lamai Beach. With its stunning ocean views and a luxe beachfront to sink your toes into, this resort offers guests the ultimate picturesque tropical getaway. The Lamai Samui brings to life an oriental heritage village backed by forested mountains and features elegant and spacious rooms and villas in which to hide away. Breathe in the scent of flourishing frangipanis and feel the calming essence of Feng Shui within and among the spaces while you spend your day at the seafront infinity pool or indulge in a relaxing treatment at Le Spa.

You'll find multiple dining spaces at your doorstep - try The Plate, The Ocean Pier and The Pool Bar, each serving up its own version of delicious international and Thai cuisine. Feel like taking a wander? With car rental and limousine services available, you'll be able to travel to the furthest stretches of Koh Samui in luxury and ease. Soak up serene ambience while attentive staff ensure you have a memorable and relaxing stay.
offer_address: 146/24 Moo 4 Lamai Beach, Maret, Koh Samui 84310, Thailand

title: Koh Samui Boutique Beachfront Bliss with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Massages
description:
Make the palm-fringed white sands and turquoise waters of Lamai Beach your backyard at this tropical retreat. The first hotel established on this sought-after stretch of Koh Samui beach, operating for over 40 years, you can expect nothing short of a postcard-perfect getaway, accompanied by warm hospitality. 

Start your day with a hearty a la carte or buffet breakfast before making a splash in the resort’s lagoon-like pool. To truly unwind, indulge in a massage with your significant other, or sip on cocktails in tropical surroundings. Step beyond the resort grounds and find yourself enveloped by coconut groves, lush forests and reef-rich waters just waiting to be discovered.
offer_address: 128 Lamai Beach, M.3, Maret, Koh Samui, Suratthani 84310, Thailand

title: Oceanfront Koh Samui Escape with Massages, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
This is the Thailand of your dreams - between lush tropical gardens and the dazzling sapphire waters of the Gulf of Thailand, Nora Beach Resort & Spa offers a slice of secluded serenity just moments from Koh Samui’s most beloved beach town, Chaweng, and Samui International Airport. After sun-kissed days spent chasing the region’s incredible surf and sand, return to Prasuthon Restaurant for perfectly grilled, local-catch seafood, or savour happy hour by the resort’s spectacular Pool Bar. Koh Samui’s sunsets are legendary - there’s no finer place to kick back and enjoy the view.

Ready to explore? Koh Samui’s acclaimed nightclubs, ancient temples and extraordinary waterfalls all await. Whether it’s lazing in a hammock, sampling Thailand’s brilliant dining scene or diving Koh Samui’s world-class reefs, whatever you desire, it’s yours.
offer_address: 222 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui, Suratthani 84320, Thailand

title: Tranquil Koh Samui Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Daily Two-Course Lunch or Dinner
description:
Tune in to island time, where blissful beach days and sunset cocktails are in abundance at Avani+ Samui Resort, a beachfront paradise stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, making it one of the top 10% of properties worldwide. Perched on a slice of secluded beachfront on Koh Samui’s quiet southwestern corner, you can enjoy serene days away from the crowds to rest and recharge. Koh Samui is a treasure trove of fun things to do. Spend days chasing waterfalls or beach hopping before following your tastebuds to some of the island’s renowned dining hot spots. Plus, the resort offers a longtail boat trip to neighbouring island Koh Madsum, where white-sand beaches, vibrant snorkelling and adventurous kayaking is on the menu.

If you prefer to stay put, Avani+ Samui Resort has you covered. Relax by the swimming pool with a tropical cocktail, feast on authentic Thai or international cuisine at Essence Restaurant or watch the sunset with a drink in hand at the Rooftop Lounge. The AvaniFit fully equipped fitness centre will ensure you won’t have to skip your daily exercise during your escape. When you’re ready to relax, book in a pampering treatment at the indulgent AvaniSpa.
offer_address: 53/5 Moo 4, Phang Ka, Taling Ngam, Koh Samui, Suratthani 84140 Thailand

title: Koh Samui Award-Winning Private Island Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Drinks
description:
Witness azure waters lap palm-cloaked cliffs and powder-white beaches at the five-star Cape Fahn Hotel - an intimate private island haven only moments from the shores of Koh Samui, yet a million miles from everyday life. A tranquil gem dropped in the ocean just off Choeng Mon Beach, this secluded retreat features an intimate collection of ultra-luxe villas with private pools and mesmerising views. Gaze over lush tropical hills, picture-perfect ocean and the endless horizon, enhanced by an accompanying soundtrack of gentle waves and tropical birdlife.

Transcend bliss with an invigorating treatment at the hotel spa, sink into a beanbag with a good book at the activities pavilion or watch ever-changing sunset hues from the terrace of Long Dtai restaurant. A member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, Cape Fahn Hotel is rated among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor and among Travel + Leisure World's Best Awards 2021: Top 10 Resorts in Southeast Asia. Experience a level of paradise you never knew existed on this breathtaking escape.

Find blissful seclusion on this impressive stretch of beach known for its pristine white sand and clear blue waters, or choose from one of the resort's two swimming pools to laze your days away. You'll be pampered with a buffet breakfast every day, indulgent dining experiences, daily cocktails, a 60-minute massage per adult and round-trip transfers from Koh Samui Airport.

Treat the whole family to a sun-kissed escape: check out the Family Upgrade, with two children aged 11 years and under staying for free with daily breakfast, round-trip airport transfers and free meals when dining with adults.

title: Five-Star Beachfront Koh Samui Suites with Daily Breakfast, Choice of Three-Course Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Escape to a five-star retreat, Royal Muyang Samui Villas, pocketed away on the northeast sands of Koh Samui. Feel like you’re worlds away in this natural paradise on Choeng Mon Beach and witness the glory of the sun rising and setting over the untouched coastline from your peaceful suite. Launch into luscious experiences and discover all that Thailand has to offer, from cultural experiences, delicious food and exhilarating adventures.

Taste your way around four onsite restaurants, including the intimate Spice Zone Beach Restaurant, which hovers at the oceanfront or indulge in delicious Italian pizza and pasta at Ciccio Ristorante & Pizzeria. If it’s relaxation you’re seeking, get away from it all with a spa treatment at Cave Rai Ra Beach Spa. Though seemingly remote, the action is not too far away. Follow the locals to uncover the local array of restaurants, boutiques and bars in town, or simply walk along the tree-lined sands in search for your next ocean escapade.
offer_address: 89 Moo 5, Choengmon Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui, Suratthani 84320, Thailand

description:
Paradise awaits at the breathtaking Silavadee Pool Spa Resort, a secluded five-star luxury oasis built high up on the coastal cliffs overlooking Laem Nan Beach on Koh Samui. Spend balmy days sipping cocktails by the pool while looking out onto jaw-dropping panoramas or venture to Silavadee Spa, where a slew of rejuvenating treatments await. Then, head to the private beach, available exclusively for resort use, and experience some of the island’s best snorkelling away from the crowds. To round out your day, head to the two onsite restaurants serving up exquisite meals showcasing the flavours of the region, or sip on an expertly shaken cocktail at the Star rooftop bar at sunset for an unforgettable night.

When you're ready to explore, the must-visit spots are within easy reach, including  Lamai City Centre, Hin-Ta and Hin-Yai Rocks and lively beach clubs, plus plenty of family-friendly restaurants and attractions.

Feed your curiosity and set off on a gastronomic adventure at Odyssey Restaurant - delight your senses with a cooking class or indulge in Mediterranean-inspired cuisine paired with a creative cocktail overlooking the turquoise sea.

Beyond the resort, discover Koh Samui's captivating beaches, mountainous jungle terrain and magnificent islands, all within easy reach. Soak up the spirited atmosphere of the nearby Bo Phut, home to Samui's famed Big Buddha Temple, or take a shuttle to Bo Phut and enjoy a drink at the vibrant Fisherman's Village. A tranquil gem dropped in the ocean just off Choeng Mon Beach, this secluded retreat is a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, rated among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor and ranked among Travel + Leisure World's Best Awards 2021: Top 10 Resorts in Southeast Asia. Stroll beneath palm-cloaked cliffs along white sand, savour an invigorating treatment at the hotel spa, or treat your tastebuds at Michelin-starred chef David Thompson's Long Dtai restaurant. Experience a level of paradise you never knew existed on this breathtaking escape.

description: Fall in love with island life with five nights of private pool villa luxury on the Thai island of Koh Samui - just a one hour flight from Bangkok - staying at Kanda Residences. Includes return airport transfers, a bottle of bubbly on arrival, daily breakfasts, massages, a cooking class, a tapas lunch or dinner, a daily cocktail each, complimentary shuttle service to Chaweng Beach and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Koh Samui Five-Star Beachfront Retreat with Dinners, Daily Breakfast, Daily Massages & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Blessed with deep aquamarine waters and sugar-white sandy stretches, lush jungle terrain and bustling villages teeming with endless things to see and do, Koh Samui is the laidback paradise you’ve been dreaming of - and there’s no better place to immerse yourself in the island’s wonders than Amari Koh Samui.

Desirably located on a secluded stretch of Chaweng Beach, with stunning views over the Gulf of Thailand, this idyllic haven places you exactly where you want to be. It's a chilled-out beachfront location, perfect for families and couples who want to soak up the serenity, but with plenty to do. Choose to explore far and wide, with the island’s location the perfect launchpad to the pristine archipelago of Ang Thong National Marine Park, where towering limestone mountains, thick jungle and hidden waterfalls beckon. Although, you could be forgiven for never wanting to leave this stunning resort thanks to its exceptional facilities. Feel immediately refreshed as you plunge into not one, but two gleaming pools, luxuriate at the heavenly onsite spa, watch the sun drop below the horizon as you sip an expertly shaken cocktail at the bar overlooking the ocean, savour delicious fare at the stylish restaurant and rest easy knowing little ones are taken care of with hours of entertainment at the Kids' Club. At the end of the day, retreat to your thoughtfully designed room to rest, recharge and repeat all over again.
offer_address: 14/3, Chaweng Beach Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

title: Centara Koh Samui Five-Star Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Signature Set-Menu Dinner Experience & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Make those tropical Thailand dreams come true with an escape to the five-star Centara Reserve Samui, a beachfront retreat centred around you. As the inaugural property in Centara’s carefully curated luxury collection, Centara Reserve Samui is positioned to emerge as one of the most coveted destinations on the island, home to six exquisite bars and restaurants, two dazzling resort pools (including an adults-only reprieve) and a spa offering tailored treatments using herbs from the organic garden.

Take lazy strolls along Chaweng Beach, then soak up the tropical sunshine on a plush oceanfront lounger. Drinks can be ordered at the Pool Bar or The Terrace, where piazza-style seating invites you to take a break and enjoy a selection of cocktails and light bites. A pre-dinner tipple at The Gin Run bar leads into relaxed evenings dining on contemporary Thai favourites at Sa-Nga restaurant, fresh seafood at Salt Society Beach Bar & Kitchen or modern high-end cuisine at Spanish Grill at Act 5. This discerning Thai sanctuary is the break from the every day you've been searching for.
offer_address: 38/2 Moo 3, Borpud, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

title: Mantra Samui: Boutique Oceanview Hideaway
description: Panoramic ocean views and friendly Thai service awaits at the recently reopened Mantra Samui. Wake up to sprawling ocean views from your private balcony, begin each day with complimentary daily buffet breakfasts, unwind by the pool with a daily cocktail each, sample Thai food with two dining experiences, relax with two 45-minute massages each and enjoy convenient return airport transfers for two.
offer_address: 9/124 Moo1, Mae Nam, Koh Samui, 84330, Thailand

title: Koh Samui Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Drift off to one of Thailand's most dreamy islands at this oceanfront oasis, set on a private beach in vibrant Chaweng. Reset among lush tropical gardens, steps from the glimmering beachfront and moments away from the centre of Koh Samui's most beloved beach town, easily reached via your resort's complimentary shuttle.

Spend relaxed hours lounging by the oceanfront pool or immersed in it by the Pool Bar, sipping refreshing cocktails. After sun-kissed days, unwind with a blissful treatment or sauna session at The Anodas Spa before heading to beachside Prasuthon Restaurant for perfectly grilled seafood.

When you're ready for activity, Koh Samui’s ancient temples and majestic waterfalls are at your fingertips. Whether you choose to explore a nearby night market, savour Thailand's culinary delights at local restaurants or stay at the resort and kayak or paddleboard through the Gulf of Thailand's crystal waters, this escape is yours to shape.
offer_address: 222 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui, Suratthani 84320, Thailand

title: Escape to a Thai Island Oasis with Massages, Cocktails & More
description: Soak up the palm-fringed beauty of one of Thailand’s most sought-after island destinations, Koh Samui, staying in a prime beachfront location at The Passage Samui Villas & Resort - a resort that truly has it all with three swimming pools and one of the island’s most impressive oceanfront restaurants. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, two three-course Thai dinners, one nightly cocktail each, a daily 30-minute massage and convenient return airport transfers.

Make use of the kayaks and paddle boards provided, soak up the ocean views and tropical sunshine or take a dip in the infinity pool. If you're ready to relax even further, take in a treatment at the onsite Beach Garden Spa. When you can tear yourself away from this slice of bliss, you are only 10 minutes from the market, dining and lively nightlife at Chaweng.

description: Boutique and brilliantly bodacious, Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel & Beach Club is a retro-cool oasis perfectly positioned on Chaweng Beach’s golden sands. Newly opened in August 2022, this slice of paradise has everything you need to soak up Koh Samui’s chilled-out vibes - sip Long Island iced teas at the upbeat Social Bar, snorkel the magnificent waters of nearby Koh Tan or feast on sushi and sundaes at party-central Seen Beach Club, host to some of the island’s hippest events.

vendor_name: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort & Spa
title: Thailand: Koh Samui Beachfront Haven
description: Experience a luxurious stay at Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort, a five-star beachfront hideaway where you're invited to experience true relaxation. Be soothed as you cast your eyes over lush gardens and a sparkling infinity pool, step onto the sandy stretches of Chaweng Beach or enjoy a moment of bliss at Anantara Spa. Later, ascend to the jungle canopy at Tree Tops Sky Dining & Bar or head to The Singing Bird Lounge for a round of cocktails before venturing to SEEN Beach Club Samui.
offer_address: 92/1 Moo 2, Bophut, Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

title: Beachfront Koh Samui Luxury
description:
Discover paradise in the heart of Koh Samui with a stay at the intimate Rocky’s Boutique Resort. Perfectly poised beachfront, in a secluded cove near Lamai Beach, this luxurious resort is just minutes from all the action yet offers privacy and tranquillity thanks to its expansive lush grounds.

The unique, individually designed accommodation invites serenity, with traditional Thai artwork, teak furnishings and close proximity to the beach as standard. Spend the day lounging poolside or lazing on the resort’s own beach, where powdery white sand gives way to unparalleled views of the Gulf of Thailand. Unwind at the onsite spa, where a menu of rejuvenating and revitalising treatments await or dine on local favourites and western classics at one of the resort's renowned restaurants. Discover the secrets of fragrant Thai cuisine at a cooking class, travel by cycle around the village, or explore the area with the resort's private boat or complimentary shuttle to local hotspots. For families, a kids' club allows little ones to explore their creativity - and parents to enjoy some much-needed time off.
offer_address: 438/1 Moo 1, T.Maret, Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84310, Thailand

title: Five-Star Koh Samui Oceanfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Rooftop Cocktails
description:
Paradise awaits at the breathtaking Silavadee Pool Spa Resort, built high up on the coastal cliffs overlooking Laem Nan Beach on Koh Samui. Spend balmy days sipping cocktails by the pool while looking out onto jaw-dropping panoramas of the Gulf of Thailand - pure bliss. Two unique onsite restaurants boast these same glorious views while serving up exquisite meals showcasing the flavours of the region. This resort is the perfect relaxation remedy: treat yourself to an indulgent massage at the Silavadee Spa after a long flight before ordering a lavish cocktail at Star rooftop bar at sunset for a truly unforgettable night in.

Enjoy luxurious seclusion at Silavadee Pool Spa Resort, set away from the hustle and bustle of Koh Samui’s town centre. A private beach is available exclusively for resort use, which means you can experience some of the island’s best snorkelling away from the crowds. And when you’re ready to venture down from the clifftops and back into civilisation, the town is only a five-minute shuttle bus ride away.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):**

- Wake up to a delicious **daily buffet breakfast** at Moon restaurant
- Toast your escape in paradise with a **daily cocktail each** at Star rooftop bar
- Enjoy **one signature three-course dinner** for two at Moon or The Height (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Convenient **roundtrip airport transfers** in an air-conditioned vehicle (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Relax with **one 45-minute foot or head-and-shoulder massage** each (for stays of 5+ nights)

**Pool Villa Upgrades available**: Wake up to glorious ocean views from your plush king bed before slipping into a private infinity pool to while away an afternoon in paradise.

Please refer to Fine Print for details of renovation works taking place between April 2025 and December 2025.
offer_address: 208/66 Moo 4, Maret, Ko Samui, Surat Thani 84310, Thailand

vendor_name: X2 Koh Samui - A Spa Retreat
title: Five-Star Koh Samui Villas
description:
Azure waters, dramatic limestone cliffs, lush forest, jungle terrain, exceptional cuisine and vibrant nightlife are just a few of the reasons to visit one of Thailand’s most popular spots - and you’re invited to unearth Thai island tranquility during a luxurious stay at X2 Koh Samui - A Spa Retreat.

Impeccably located on a private beach in the southern corner of Koh Samui, this luxe resort is as glamorous as it is relaxing. A stroll through this tranquil haven reveals something to please all, with an expansive pool - one of the deepest on the island - perfectly manicured gardens, a spa offering relaxing treatments, restaurant serving modern international cuisine and views of the glimmering Gulf of Thailand.
location_description: X2 Koh Samui - A Spa Retreat
offer_address: 442 Moo 1 Baan Hua Thanon, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84310, Thailand

Positioned on the shores of the  Thong Nai Pan Beach, the resort offers gourmet dining options paired with poolside cocktails, along with wellness treatments from the deluxe spa surrounded by verdant jungle terrain. Take a 40-minute speedboat ride to Koh Samui, where vibrant nightlife and bustling street markets await.

title: Tranquil Avani Koh Samui Beachfront Escape with Rooftop Lounge
description: Blissful beach days and sunset cocktails are in abundance at Avani+ Samui Resort, perched on a slice of secluded beachfront on Koh Samui’s quiet southwestern corner. Spend days basking by the swimming pool, feast on authentic Thai or international cuisine at Essence Restaurant or watch the sunset with a drink in hand at the Rooftop Lounge. The AvaniFit fully equipped fitness centre will ensure you won’t have to skip your daily exercise during your escape, and when you’re ready to relax, book in a pampering treatment at the indulgent AvaniSpa.

vendor_name: The Coast Adults Only Resort and Spa, Koh Samui
title: Koh Samui Adults-Only Beachfront Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Lining a secluded 120m stretch of Maenam Beach’s powdery sands, The Coast Resort and Spa Koh Samui is an adults-only paradise where you can enjoy dazzling dawn-to-dusk panoramas across the glittering Gulf of Thailand from the beachfront infinity pool.

Part of Tripadvisor’s prestigious Travellers' Choice 2020 ‘Best of the Best’ and ranked in Thailand’s ‘Top 25 Hotels for Romance’, this top-rated oasis offers intimate seclusion. Stay among the swaying palms, within a stone's throw of Koh Samui’s nightlife, yet far enough away that you can relax on the champagne sand uninterrupted. Watch the sunrise with complimentary rooftop yoga classes, glide along the crystal-clear waters of the Gulf with complimentary kayak hire, and float away in the infinity pool as you’re serenaded by live music every Friday evening.
location_description: The Coast Koh Samui - Adults Only Resort and Spa
offer_address: 44/134, Koh Samui Surat Thani 84330 Thailand

title: Koh Samui Award-Winning Private Island Pool Villas
description:
Witness azure waters lap palm-cloaked cliffs and powder-white beaches at the five-star Cape Fahn Hotel - an intimate private island haven only moments from the shores of Koh Samui, yet a million miles from everyday life. A tranquil gem dropped in the ocean just off Choeng Mon Beach, this secluded retreat features an intimate collection of ultra-luxe villas with private pools and mesmerising views. Gaze over lush tropical hills, picture-perfect ocean and the endless horizon, enhanced by an accompanying soundtrack of gentle waves and tropical birdlife.

Transcend bliss with an invigorating treatment at the hotel spa, sink into a beanbag with a good book at the activities pavilion or watch ever-changing sunset hues from the terrace of Long Dtai restaurant. A member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, Cape Fahn Hotel is rated among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Experience a level of paradise you never knew existed and so much more on this breathtaking escape.
offer_address: 24/269, Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

title: Award-Winning Koh Samui Beachfront Bliss
description:
Discover the true meaning of Thai luxury with an escape to Buri Rasa Village Samui, awarded the Best Luxury Beach Hotel and Best Luxury Boutique Resort - Continent Winner at the REVE Luxury Awards 2025. Perched on the pristine sands of Chaweng, on the east coastline of Koh Samui, this boutique resort offers the best of everything, with lapping crystal-clear waters, lush tropical greenery and vibrant nightlife all just seconds away.

Rooms and suites combine traditional southern Thai architecture with contemporary luxury to encourage beachfront bliss from the moment you walk in. Once you’ve explored every indulgent detail, set up for a day of sunshine by the slate-sided pool or white sands of Chaweng Beach, with a soundtrack of lapping water and refreshments courtesy of the Beach Bar. When hunger strikes, venture to the oceanfront Beach Club restaurant, where sensational seafood is transformed into modern Thai dishes, served alongside a selection of wines from the old and new world. When you’re ready to be pampered, Nam Thai Herbal Spa is home to one-of-a-kind treatments in a lush tropical setting, dialling up the relaxation levels to ‘heavenly’.
offer_address: 11/2, Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

title: Five-Star Koh Samui Hilltop Escape with All-Pool Villas
description:
A secluded slice of serenity awaits at the hilltop hideaway of Banyan Tree Samui, a five-star pool-villa resort ranked #4 among resorts in Lamai Beach on Koh Samui by Tripadvisor. Here you'll discover true bliss in the form of a private villa with infinity pool overlooking spectacular garden and ocean scenes, an award-winning day spa with 10 treatment rooms, three superb restaurants, and laidback lounge and pool bars.

Unwind by your private pool, watching the palm trees sway in the sea breeze. For a touch of self-care, head to the Yoga Centre for complimentary stretching and sun salutations, cosy up in the library and games room with a good book or take the little ones to the fun-filled Kids' Club for arts and crafts, games, and traditional Thai dance classes. When you're ready to head out and explore, the buzzing centre of Lamai Beach, home to restaurants, beach bars and shops, is only a 15-minute drive away. Travel a few minutes further to Fisherman's Village with its boutique cafés, shops and famous night market which backs onto Koh Samui's most famous beach, Bophut Beach, or head to Namuang Waterfalls, a set of two cascades that plummet into a refreshing natural swimming hole
offer_address: 99, Maret, Surat Thani 84310, Thailand

title: Koh Samui Secluded Beachfront Resort Hideaway
description: Immerse yourself in tropical bliss at Bo Phut Resort & Spa Samui, a luxurious and secluded hideaway on the tropical island of Koh Samui. Savour authentic Thai cuisine at the resort's beachfront restaurant or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the spa. From a serene pool with jacuzzi to a kids' pool, kayaking and a fitness centre, the resort combines the best of traditional and contemporary Thai design.

title: Relaxing Koh Samui Beachfront Retreat with Onsite Spa, Bar & Restaurant
description: Dreaming of a tropical getaway? Escape to the stunning beaches and laidback lifestyle of Koh Samui with a stay at Paradise Beach Resort. Boasting a beachfront location on the peaceful Maenam Beach, you will enjoy easy access to the island’s vibrant shopping and nightlife while still having an environment to recharge and rejuvinate. Enjoy unwinding at the onsite spa and toast to a fabulous holiday at the bar before adventuring out into the island.

description:
Experience the epitome of Thai luxury at this five-star oceanfront resort, perched on the idyllic shores of Koh Samui. This tropical paradise boasts five stunning pools, each offering a unique perspective of the resort's lush surroundings and the endless azure of the ocean beyond.

The resort is home to Verio Spa, five pools and four exquisite onsite restaurants, each offering a unique culinary journey. From authentic Thai cuisine to international delicacies, your taste buds will be tantalised at every turn. Beyond the resort, explore the vibrant local markets, or take a leisurely boat ride to the nearby Ang Thong National Marine Park.

Make those tropical Thailand dreams come true with an escape to this sophisticated and tranquil haven, located on a pristine stretch of beachfront. title: Koh Samui Five-Star Oceanfront Haven with Clifftop Restaurant & Horizon-Facing Infinity Pool
description: Lose yourself in stunning panoramas of the Gulf of Thailand from the five-star Six Senses Samui, where a unique location on a sloping headland at the northern tip of the island makes for jaw-dropping ocean views. Take a dip in the horizon-edged infinity pool and spend days on the beach enjoying a variety of watersports. Dine at great heights at Dining on the Rocks, an alfresco restaurant placed on the tip of the headland overlooking the ocean, or head to Drift at the Beach, the new beach bar and poolside lounge, for cocktails and bites. After all that wining and dining, succumb to pampering at the spa and wellness centre, where you can enjoy relaxing treatments like massages and facials, unwind with a steam or sauna session, join a yoga class or try your hand at meditation.

title: Koh Samui Five-Star Boutique Beachside Retreat with Six Infinity Pools
description: Step onto sun-kissed sands, feel the salt breeze on your face and savour every moment of serenity when you escape to the boutique, five-star InterContinental Koh Samui Resort, dramatically positioned on jungled hilltops overlooking the dazzling Gulf of Thailand. This tranquil oasis boasts six shimmering infinity pools surrounded by sprawling lush gardens, a world-class onsite spa, four mouthwatering restaurants and views of some of the most spectacular sunsets in the world. Koh Samui’s flawless beaches, electrifying cuisine and inimitable hospitality make this the perfect escape for dreamers, romantics or families alike.

title: Serene OUTRIGGER Koh Samui Five-Star Beachfront Retreat on Lamai Beach
description: Discover a captivating blend of old-world charm and tropical tranquillity with a stay at OUTRIGGER Koh Samui Beach Resort, ideally positioned on Lamai Beach’s serene sands. This recently renovated resort brings Outrigger’s iconic reputation for top-notch hospitality to soulful Koh Samui. Savour days spent lazing by shimmering lagoon pools or sipping cocktails on warm sands at the Edgewater Beach Club.

title: Beachfront Koh Samui Paradise with Daily Breakfast
description:
Set on the immaculate beachfront overlooking the clear blue waters of Laem Yai Beach, in a tranquil corner of Koh Samui, Mai Samui Beach Resort & Spa's breathtaking location will instantly make you forget the outside world. Offering laidback tropical island ambience with a distinctly Thai touch, this Koh Samui hideaway ⁠- perfect for a couples' escape or family retreat ⁠- invites you to indulge.

title: Five-Star Koh Samui Beachfront Escape with Upscale Rooms & Infinity Pool
description:
Discover Koh Samui's laidback island lifestyle at SALA Samui Choengmon Beach Resort. Overlooking Choeng Mon, one of the most pristine beaches on the island, this five-star resort promises sophisticated luxury. Enjoy panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand, explore the spectacular sandy beaches dotted with tropical greenery and calm blue seas, lounge by the infinity pool with a refreshing drink or relax in your tastefully designed room or villa.

Enjoy beachfront dining at the al fresco SALA Samui Restaurant, a magical dining space set just metres from the shores of Choeng Mon Beach. Explore the exciting world of Thai and international flavours here, and enjoy your favourite tipples in the casual and relaxed SALA Samui Bar. What's a Thailand vacation without a massage or two? Head to the resort's extensive SALA Spa, where you can take your first step into the wellness journey. When you're feeling active, enjoy daily complimentary yoga classes and complimentary use of kayaks and paddleboards.

title: Five-Star Koh Samui Serene Seaside Stay with Spa
description: Remarkable seaside vistas meet relaxing indulgence with an escape to Choeng Mon Beach at the Kimpton Kitalay Samui, an IHG Hotel. title: Koh Samui Private Pool Villa Clifftop Escape with Daily Breakfast & Airport Transfers
description:
Embrace the chilled-out vibes of Koh Samui and live it up in true five-star luxury with a villa escape at the clifftop playground of Samujana Villas. Feel like a celebrity staying in one of the resort’s architect-designed villas, all complete with Insta-worthy infinity pools, breathtaking views and inviting open-air living areas.

Ideally positioned on a cliffside, granting ocean views and secluded privacy in all villas, this luxe property is what dreams are made of: with palatial villas fitted with lavish facilities, daily butler service to cater for every whim, delicious in-villa dining, a semi-private beach and a blissful spa, you may never want to leave this paradise.

This luxurious oasis is also a short drive to a plethora of Koh Samui's most popular bars, restaurants and shops. You’ll also find yourself just a short drive away from Choeng Mon Beach - one of Koh Samui best beaches.

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Koh Samui Beachfront Escape
description:
Experience Koh Samui's chilled vibes and discover one of the island’s most popular beaches with a sun-kissed escape at SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort. Find blissful seclusion at this award-winning, contemporary resort, nestled mere steps from Chaweng's white sand and clear blue waters. Expect nothing but luxury and sweeping views over the Gulf of Thailand from this five-star beachfront oasis, consisting of two interconnecting resorts.

From the impeccable facilities - which include a blissful spa and an open-air beachfront restaurant serving Thai and international cuisine - to the lavishly designed and decorated rooms, this designer resort brings another level of luxury to the shores of Chaweng. Whether you are happy chilling by the moon-shaped pool, sipping cocktails at the beachfront bar or want to explore the island, SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort is the ultimate base on Koh Samui.

title: Five-Star Koh Samui Beachfront Villa Luxury
description:
Indulge in the five-star feeling of truly luxurious Thai hospitality at Santiburi Koh Samui, recognised among the top 1% of hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor. Found on the northern shores of Koh Samui, on the edge of pristine Maenam Beach, this luxe escape offers the best of both worlds, surrounded by 23 acres of explorable tropical greenery.

This suite-and-villa-only secluded sanctuary blends modern design with traditional Thai touches, creating the perfect base for a luxury break. Unwind by the 50m-long swimming pool, one of Koh Samui’s largest, or head to the beach, where exclusive Santiburi Koh Samui Beach Butler service means there will always be a sunlounger, beach towel and bottled drinking water waiting for you. Take to the water with stand-up paddleboards, catamarans and kayaks, before retiring to the beachfront Lèn Spa, where the expert team will pamper you to new levels of peace, with treatments inspired by Thai tradition.

Golf aficionados will delight at the proximity to the 18-hole championship golf course at Santiburi Samui Country Club, while fitness fans will find fun among the gym, tennis court, Muay Thai boxing classes and private yoga sessions. When you’ve worked up an appetite, you’ll be spoilt for choice: will it be the relaxed garden dining of The Pool House, the traditional Thai flavours of Sala Thai, or the seafood-centric menu of The Beach House?

Unwind in the spa, venture north for a night on the town or take advantage of the location to island hop across to Koh Phangan or Koh Tao.

description: Sunkissed luxury awaits at the five-star Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort, a beachfront sanctuary overlooking the dazzling Gulf of Thailand. Surrounded by dramatic gardens, sapphire waters and world-class marine life, this opulent retreat will exceed your expectation of paradise with its myriad of luxe facilities. Tantalise your tastebuds with fusion delights at a host of bars and restaurants, including chargrilled favourites at Full Moon, casual breakfast bites at High Tide and tropical cocktails at SEEN Beach Club Samui. Relish lazy days at the Instagram-worthy infinity pool and discover true tranquillity at Anantara Spa. Koh Samui’s flawless beaches, electrifying cuisine and inimitable hospitality make this the perfect escape for dreamers, romantics and families alike.

vendor_name: ShaSa Resort and Residences Koh Samui
title: Five-Star Ocean-View Koh Samui Escape
description:
If your idea of paradise is relaxing on golden sands, swimming in turquoise waters and exploring a fascinating coral reef just 100m off the beachfront at low tide, then look no further than the beautifully secluded ShaSa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui. Hidden in one of the quieter parts of Koh Samui, this beachfront property offers jaw-dropping sea views over the Gulf of Thailand and blissful seclusion. Enjoy the resort's five-star facilities, including a pool bar overlooking the beachfront, health club, Kids’ Club to entertain younger guests with batik dyeing, rock-painting and a huge collection of LEGO, and a breathtaking lagoon pool for lounging in the glorious Koh Samui sun.

Make ShaSa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui, your tranquil launchpad and dip your toe into the vibrant nightlife of Koh Samui’s most lively district at your leisure, with a complimentary shuttle service to Lamai and Chaweng Beach - arguably one of the most stunning beaches on the Gulf of Thailand. Closer to home, why not hire a kayak and explore the breathtaking Laem Set beachfront with its incredible skittle-coloured coral reef? When you want to truly indulge, head to the incredible beachfront spa, where you can transcend to complete bliss through a menu of luxurious treatments.
offer_address: 116/1 Moo 2, Tambon Mared,, Laem Set, Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84310, Thailand

title: Koh Samui Modern Oasis on Chaweng Beach with Beach Bars & Lagoon-Style Pools
description:
Immerse yourself in the tropical allure of Koh Samui at this stunning beachfront property. Nestled in the lively heart of Chaweng, this modern retreat offers easy access to the city’s most picturesque attractions. Savour a delicious burger at the onsite Cielo Restaurant or explore local flavours at Baantana Thai. Enjoy exotic cocktails at the Cape Diem Beach Bar along with delectable snacks, or relax on the beach for sun-soaked moments.

Put on your explorer’s hat and wander through the bustling night markets, treat yourself to a traditional Thai massage at a nearby spa or take a stroll to the pristine Chaweng Beach. For a touch of culture, visit the magnificent Big Buddha Temple, just a short drive away.
